abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32782058, pmid32776268, pmid32776147, pmid32778870, pmid32782053, pmid32680535, pmid32761495, pmid32772375, pmid32778178, pmid32776551, pmid32666303, pmid32701511
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.17
